articles.title: Goldman Sachs explores investment adviser sale in retreat from mass market - Financial Times
articles.description: Personal financial management business grew from United Capital acquisition in 2019
articles.content:
Goldman Sachs is exploring a sale of the investment advisory business it acquired four years ago, marking a further retreat from efforts to be a major bank to mass-market customers.

articles.title: Elon Musk admits X ‘may fail’ after glitch deletes Twitter photos - The Guardian
articles.description: Platform’s users voice concern as it removes pictures and links on posts made before December 2014
articles.content:
Elon Musk, the owner of the app formerly known as Twitter, has said the social media site may fail, after a glitch caused pictures posted before December 2014 to be deleted.
